name: Snow Cone Cannon
description:
This a fun and colorful addictive endless play game where you need to shoot the snow cone balls into the snow cone cups. Just touch the screen to shoot a snow cone ball out of the cannon. The goal of the game is to shoot as many of the colorful snow cone balls into the snow cone cups as you can. This is a game of skill and precision.

+ Colorful Snow Cone Balls
+ Snow Cone Cannon
+ One Touch Control
+ Fun For Everyone
